title: What is encantado in English? - Answers
text: Encantado translates literally to enchanted. But it's not the common among English speech.. If you said what you needed to it for I could recommend a better word. Well, it's a pleasure. Encantado means "enchanted." You could say, "Igualmente." which means, "Likewise." with the sense that you too are enchanted to meet the person saying "Encantado." Pleased and delighted. *American English *British English *Australian English *Filipino English
